nodes.text: Hover Droids were small floating combat droids that were deployed at Cloud City shortly before the Occupation of Bespin. A Hover Droid would rotate as it remained suspended in the air. The Hover Droid existed alongside a larger model.

Hover Droids first appeared in the video game Super Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back, but they were first named in the strategy guide Super Empire Strikes Back Official Game Secrets. Hover Droids share their name with another droid the appears in Super Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back.
